name: Hello Kitty AR Kawaii World
storyline:
Explore the streets & discover new friends

Lend a hand and become Best Friends Forever

Build & decorate your own adorable Kawaii house

Invite friends for an exciting new adventure
summary: Explore your very own neighborhood and meet your beloved Sanrio characters. Discover where Hello Kitty lives or where My Melody likes to hang out. Make friends with them, and other players, and use the power of friendship to build the Kawaii world together! Help them with challenges, grow and decorate your Kawaii world, and invite more friends and family along for the adventure.
